sentence: You will be a policeman one day.
I will buy a new car next month.
I will try to come to your birthday party.
She'll go to the cinema with us.
Her son will be a great lawyer in the future.
Max will spend holiday in France next year.
My mom will make us breakfast in the morning.
We'll go to the theatre together tonight.
She will play tennis at the sports club.
I will become a famous actor in ten years.
I will travel to China in two years.
My brother will study Geography at the university.
I will read these stories in the train.
My sister will play the guitar with our dad.
I will visit 50 countries in ten years.
We will take the children to the park.
My friends will have an exam next week.
I will be 30 years old next week.
I will wait for you at the bus stop.
She will wear a green dress for the festival.
She'll write a letter to her best friend.
They'll watch a football match at the stadium.
I will help my friends with their homework.
I will take a photo of you near the castle.
We'll have pizza and salad for dinner.
